nodes.text: Manticore was an Imperial Delta-class JV-7 escort shuttle in operation during the Galactic Civil War. Along with its sister ship, Griphon, the Manticore was assigned to escort the POW-carrying Dreadnaught VTR-LX to penal station Bundil II. However, both shuttles were destroyed in a Rebel rescue operation that also destroyed VTR-LX.
